author: ggregory
msg: - Add type converters to cover missing primitive types: char, byte, short.
- Also add useful JRE types: Class, File, URI, URL, BigInteger, BigDecimal.

- TypeConverter.convert(String) now throws Exception because all call sites catch Exception and this also avoids all implementors to be forced to add try/catch blocks for convertions (See URL and URI converters for example.)

author: evanward
msg: Move Evan from Contributor to Member on the site

author: pderop
msg: Fixed a bug in ComponentImpl.remove(Dependency) method and added the corresponding integration test (RemovedDependencyTest):
When a dependency is removed from an already started component, then the component must not be stopped if other remaining available

author: andy
msg: Bug - was using a plain/simple graph at all times

author: pderop
msg: Using three services and three aspects per service
